summary:
Denki: to yeet or not to yeet, that is the question 
Sero: whether ‘tis nobler in the mind to yeet the slings and arrows of...
body:
Denki: to yeet or not to yeet, that is the question

Sero: whether ‘tis nobler in the mind to yeet the slings and arrows of outrageous fortune

Mina: or to yeet against a sea of troubles, and by opposing, yeet them

Kirishima: to die - to yeet no more

Bakugou: *gets up and leaves*

blog.description: We have imagines, head-canons, reader inserts, and more! Requests: OPEN!!! Call me CALAMARI~!

slug: 13が大好き彼らには宇宙科学博物館で働いていて宇宙関連の権力を持っている彼氏がいますか
summary: 13が大好き！彼らには宇宙科学博物館で働いていて宇宙関連の権力を持っている彼氏がいますか？
question: 13が大好き！彼らには宇宙科学博物館で働いていて宇宙関連の権力を持っている彼氏がいますか？
answer:
Translate: 
I love 13! Do they have a boyfriend who works at the Space Science Museum and has space-related power?

This is so wholesome! Sorry I have to write in English >.< 

I would assume so, actually. In fact, that’s how they would meet. Thirteen’s boyfriend would see Thirteen and absolutely freak out! They would bond over their love for space and from then on, they would be together romantically! They’re super compatible! ^-^ ♥ -Calamari

summary: So I decided to draw villain!Mic because I wanted to do it for a long time. I gave him a name, Radical Hysteria. Why? - you...
caption: So I decided to draw villain!Mic because I wanted to do it for a long time. I gave him a name, Radical Hysteria. Why? - you might ask. The answer is simple, I was inspired by v-kei band BORN and their vocals, Ryouga. I really think they have something in common.

reblog.comment: So I decided to draw villain!Mic because I wanted to do it for a long time. I gave him a name, Radical Hysteria. Why? - you might ask. The answer is simple, I was inspired by v-kei band BORN and their vocals, Ryouga. I really think they have something in common.

trail.content_raw: So I decided to draw villain!Mic because I wanted to do it for a long time. I gave him a name, Radical Hysteria. Why? - you might ask. The answer is simple, I was inspired by v-kei band BORN and their vocals, Ryouga. I really think they have something in common.

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Dreaming of Sunlight
description:
by Boomdawg

Kirishima is a half-dragon, half-human shifter. As a young kid, he had two friends. Two friends whose names he can’t quite remember because:
When he was young, he was kidnapped. Forced to work as a slave with other dragons. Forced to forget much of his human side.
When his two magical friends come to rescue him, he has to come to terms with reality. With how much things have changed, how much the trio has grown. How different he is and why. He has to make a decision:
Is he a man, or is he a dragon?
What does he lose in choosing one over the other?
Is it possible to not choose?
Or…
Can he choose both?

Words: 3111, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Kirishima Eijirou, Bakugou Katsuki, Uraraka Ochako, fatgum
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou/Uraraka Ochako, Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Bakugou Katsuki/Uraraka Ochako, Kirishima Eijirou/Uraraka Ochako
  • Additional Tags: kirikacchako, Fantasy AU, Dragon!Kirishima, warlock!bakugou, mystic!Uraraka, Angst, Pining

blog.name: ochabowlzine
blog.title: Caught in your orbit: An Ochabowl Zine
blog.description:
An SFW zine centered around the romantic relationships between Ochako Uraraka and other various Boku no Hero Academia characters
Answered asks | Updates
Mobile links | Twitter

summary: With so many zines about romantic relationships between our girl Ochako Uraraka and other Boku no Hero Academia characters, it...
caption:
With so many zines about romantic relationships between our girl Ochako Uraraka and other Boku no Hero Academia characters, it is time for the less popular and appreciated pairings to take the spotlight.

This zine would feature mostly less appreciated pairings, because ships such as Izuocha or Kacchako already have zines dedicated to them, but that doesn’t mean that they wouldnt be featured too!

If you are interested in a zine like described above, please consider filling out the interest check so I can see what specifically you would like to see.

Interest check
Alternative link if the one above doesn’t work: https://forms.gle/aVERVpy1eefYrqZy8

blog.name: larapedan
blog.title: Larapedan
blog.description: Lara • Russia • Artist

Welcome to my multi-fandom blog! I post my own art occasionally (please do not alter or repost). My favorite topic is the Dragneel Brothers. Recently I've been reduced to a sobbing mess over the characters of Haven :') Avatar is Natsu, drawn by me. Header is my 2018 New Years painting of Mavis & Zeref. Previously myriadist. 412435 is theoretically temporary but darned if I can come up with a username I like! Sometimes I bemoan the fact that I'm not more popular and then I remember haha oh yeah silly me that would require actually posting or some nonsense :P

summary: Anyone know what happened to the artist Keiid (previously xfairydrawing)? She was big in the Fairy Tail fandom for a while then...
body:
Anyone know what happened to the artist Keiid (previously xfairydrawing)? She was big in the Fairy Tail fandom for a while then BNHA.

Seems her Keiid blog was deactivated and the username got taken by something unrelated. Also, her posts have become significantly more difficult to find.
